feature.label: Feature
feature.description: -- 2025-05-15 ADDED : * Update Github project web site * Update About Box text FIXED : Nothing -- 2025-05-06 ADDED : Arduino Uno Diary source viewer configuration FIXED : Nothing -- 2025-04-28 ADDED : * Move to 2025_03 eclipse release * Changes for Arduino Uno R4 (AR_INTERNAL, AR_DEFAULT etc.) * Update documentation (Help content and about box) * Improve copy/paste action with log or data files FIXED : * Improve user Cancel operation during processes compilation * Improve USB Serial communication during process execution (Arduino Uno) -- 2025-02-14 ADDED : * Improve Arduino Uno process code (restart and Watchdog timer) * Start support for Arduino Uno R4 * Small re-factoring (Arduino Uno - ADWin) FIXED : * Exception raised when project was just created but not opened * Rename resource : Reg Exp was wrong as we needed to replace process file ext at name's end * NPE when no stimulus file is defined * Diary and data files and test folder were not properly closed when Exc. occurs * Process must not be systematically closed (ArduinoUnoProcess.execute()) * Enable arduino CLI path when use CLI is true (ArduinoUnoDacqConfiguration) -- 2025-01-29 - Bis ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * NPE at dacqsystems.adwin.ADWinChannel.close(ADWinChannel.java:265) -- 2025-01-29 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Use generic type to avoid compiler warning (Process Editor) * Wrong test correction (Editor Copy action) -- 2025-01-27 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Compiler errors ! -- 2025-01-27 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * ADWin IP Gatherer, Windows only, IOException: Cannot run program -- 2024-07-15 ADDED : * SWT Chart (static) - Use this library for Data Editor FIXED : * replace getRuntime().exec(String) by getRuntime().exec(String[]) (ADwin) -- 2024-06-28 ADDED : * Eclipse standard console FIXED : * Arduino Uno compiler : 'chmod' error -- 2024-06-26 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * "0" was not allowed by regexp (Adwin parameter Dialog) -- 2024-06-24 ADDED : * Update to JavaSE21, Tycho 4.0.8 and Eclipse 2024-06 FIXED : * EXPORT Features and Markers : "SyntaxError: (unicode error) 'unicodeescape' codec can't decode bytes..." (Python) * Resource leak: 'zipFile' is never closed (Import Resource) -- 2024-06-17 ADDED : * NRTSWTChart : use pure SWT charts (time and XY charts) for real time display (no more OpenGL or JChart2D) * Arduino Uno : Changes to handle sample frequencies less than 10Hz * NRTSWTXYChart : Series Thickness - Show current values - Draw lines algorithm * Real time Meter charts : add fill color * Improve global color management (Use exclusively JFace color registry) FIXED : * NRTSWTChart - RTSWTXYSerie - getPointsArrayToDraw() : i must not go up to currentIndex * NRTSWTChart - Plotline : x0, y0, x1 and y1 must not be negative and smaller than image dimension * NRTSWTChart : force popup menu to be hidden before continuing in dispose event -- 2024-06-09 ADDED : * JChart2D library FIXED : * Bug with copy/paste action -- 2024-05-27 - BIS ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Duplicate '\' in absolute file path before replacement (Export marker function) -- 2024-05-27 ADDED : * "Mark last sample" option in time marker function (Python, Matlab) FIXED : * Python filter function name is not lfilt but lfilter -- 2024-05-25 ADDED : * Prefix to trial start mode and trial validate mode FIXED : * Update transient properties when default property is used -- 2024-05-22 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Close any Editor when parent resource is renamed -- 2024-05-21 - Bis ADDED : * Low and high BLP filter using 'filter' function (Matlab & Python) * Property type info during Experiment importation FIXED : * Allow empty selection in experiment view * Bug when renaming experiment : in Process (associated DACQ file path) and trial (associated Process file path) properties -- 2024-05-21 ADDED : * Auto and Manual validation mode to trials FIXED : * Upgrade to handle comments in parameters editor -- 2024-05-16 ADDED : * Help and comment in parameters file * Arduino CLI can now be used * Add "Padd with last value" option (Pref.) when loading data FIXED : Nothing -- 2024-04-18 ADDED : * Table editor for Parameters editor FIXED : Nothing -- 2024-04-10 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * CR, LF chars must be sent this order : CR then LF and not LF then CR -- 2024-01-08 ADDED : * Manage the error when ADBasic binary file for the process is not found FIXED : Nothing -- 2023-12-13 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * NPE in ADWin CAN Module -- 2023-12-07 ADDED : * Manage line ruler column color in source editor * https://teamicstechnos.github.io/DOCoMETRe/ to About box FIXED : Nothing -- 2023-12-04 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Update markers when the selected editor page changes(Process Editor) * Call super implementation (ADBasic source editor) -- 2023-11-27 ADDED : * Update GEF plugin FIXED : Nothing -- 2023-11-27 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Custom Library GUI building bug * IPs gatherer bug (ADWin general Dacq. Conf.) -- 2023-11-21 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Manage UI Warning if Dacq. Conf. lib. version differs from main version -- 2023-11-20 - Bis ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Use "-Dp2.httpRule=allow" in VM command line (New p2 version requires https default) -- 2023-11-20 ADDED : * Print main software version and used libraries version (ADWin) * Warning if Dacq. Conf. lib. version differs from main version * Update doc (index.md) FIXED : * Reverse synchro chars output (LF then CR and not CR then LF, ADWin) -- 2023-10-26 ADDED : update to jdk 17 FIXED : nothing -- 2023-08-28 - Bis ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Approximate Entropy function header typo correction -- 2023-08-28 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Update Approximate Entropy python function header -- 2023-07-03 ADDED : * Multiscale Sample Entropy Function (Matlab & Python) FIXED : Nothing -- 2023-06-20 ADDED : * CR/LF options to float serial output function (ADWin) FIXED : Nothing -- 2023-06-20 ADDED : * Multi dimensional Feature support * Update help : how to use figures in expression functions ? * Sample entropy and Approximate sample entropy functions FIXED : * Bug in Threshold Python function * Missing break in ChartFactory.java * Typo error in DOCoMETRe.py -- 2023-03-14 ADDED : * Add licence option to Matlab command line FIXED : Nothing -- 2023-03-13 ADDED : * Import data from text files organized in column * Change message error color FIXED : Nothing -- 2023-02-27 ADDED : * CR and LF options in Serial Output function (ADWin) FIXED : Nothing -- 2023-02-13 ADDED : * Improve serial output functions : now can handle literals and channels FIXED : Nothing -- 2023-02-12 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Support for string parameters (use \n as seprator char) -- 2023-02-10 ADDED : * Support for string parameters FIXED : * NPE in adwin dacq configuration pages * Bad functions absolute path initialization (Adwin and ArduinoUno) -- 2023-02-07 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Remove moduleNumber parameter for Adwin Gold devices (Write FLOAT RS232 function) -- 2023-02-06 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Remove moduleNumber parameter for Adwin Gold devices (Write ASCII chars RS232 function) -- 2023-01-24 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Update site URL move from univmed to univ-amu -- 2023-01-13 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * dispose display at shutdown -- 2023-01-09 ADDED : * Save worksapce dialog data and return exit code FIXED : Nothing -- 2023-01-09 ADDED : * Save worksapce dialog data and return exit code FIXED : Nothing -- 2023-01-09 ADDED : * Improve export script code (Matlab) FIXED : * Syntax error in exported script code (Python) -- 2023-01-07 - Bis ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Remove test code (Docometre.py) -- 2023-01-07 ADDED : * Report progress with progress service (Save all action) FIXED : Nothing -- 2023-01-07 ADDED : * Update workbench when Math Engine pref is changed FIXED : * Wrong index for end value (MAXIMUM.FUN, Matlab) * Wrong index for trial number (TIME_MARKER.FUN, Matlab) * Wrong End cut value when current values size is bigger (loadDataDocometre, Matlab) -- 2023-01-06 ADDED : * Remember last trials list for all functions * Add warning message if process resource does not exist (RunBatchDataProcessingDelegate) * Change intro text * Matplotlib must run in Main thread (Python engine - JVM mode) * Block until a callback is available (Python engine - JVM mode) FIXED : * Channel, 2D and 3D chart editors are not persistent * Dot not try to deserialize if it's a channel (ObjectsController) * Do not enable rename action if selected resource is channel (RenameResourceAction) * NPE if process resource does not exist (ExportScriptWizard) -- 2022-12-12 ADDED : * Support for network port numbers management with Python Math. Engine FIXED : Nothing -- 2022-12-09 - BIS ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Index Out Of Bounds exception in Find Amplitude Forward -- 2022-12-09 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Clear error message when selection changes (Export Markers and Features functions) -- 2022-12-08 ADDED : * Expression function : add/improve content assistants (Source viewer and expressions) FIXED : * Expression function : increase horizontal Spacing to show decoration icon * Expression function : add error message if Math. Engine is not started -- 2022-12-06 ADDED : * Export batch processing script code to file FIXED : * Don't add modified decorator if subject is not loaded * Update batch data processing when subject or process is renamed -- 2022-11-23 ADDED: * It is now possible to run single process in Batch data proc. editor * Dialog to be able to save several subjects at a time * Export features function (Matlab and Python) FIXED : * Update signal editor (sample freq., front/end cuts) * Ignore unknown elements in XML files * Don't run batch process if math. engine is not running -- 2022-11-19 ADDED : * Export Markers function : add support for relative/absolute dest. * Markers difference function (Matlab and Python) * Markers difference function set initial selection for difference type * Show samples and Keep scale when trials change in signals editors FIXED : * Bad trial number with Python (indices start form zero with Python) * Export Markers function : turn widget field to transient for serialization * Motion distance function : index correction * Remove pulses function : clear SignalSizes variable * Export Markers function : clear several variables * Export Markers function : NPE * Don't use cells anymore with features (Matlab) * Clear pulses function : message refactoring * Find amplitude forward : index bug correction -- 2022-11-07 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * We don't need to compile data processing processes (Compile Dialog) -- 2022-11-04 ADDED : * Support for cached logging before messages view activation * Improve Error and Standard log file redirection * Add support for auto/manual build switch FIXED : * Remove System.out * NPE in DataProcessEditor.java * Graphic is disposed in DocometreAnnotationAccesExtension.java -- 2022-10-21 ADDED : * Persistence for link with editor action view (Experiments view) * Persistence for editors FIXED : Nothing -- 2022-10-20 ADDED : * Stimulus recording and visualization are now allowed * Improve script connection router FIXED : Nothing -- 2022-10-18 - Bis ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Add Support for stimuli for ADwin variables - End -- 2022-10-18 ADDED : * Experiments view link with editors FIXED : * Layout management in Module pages -- 2022-10-13 - QUATER ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Update help -- 2022-10-13 - TER ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Enhance Modules observers management -- 2022-10-13 - BIS ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Remove duplicate backed channels in RS232 modules * NPE in RS232 modules -- 2022-10-13 ADDED : * ADBasic Compilation on OSX using Docker is now working * Help updated FIXED : * Class cast and NPE exceptions -- 2022-10-12 - Bis ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * ADBasic compile error (Could not find a SUB with the specified name. write_fifo()) -- 2022-10-12 ADDED : * Support for stimuli for ADwin variables - Step 3 FIXED : Nothing -- 2022-10-11 - Bis ADDED : * Support for stimuli for ADwin variables - Step 2 FIXED : * Floating point exception when frequency of RS232 module is empty * Synchro chars CR+LF were not send when using ICE system -- 2022-10-11 ADDED : * Support for ICE with RS232 module * Support for stimuli for ADwin variables (Step 1) * "Remove pulses" function (Maltab @ Python) FIXED : * Wrong tooltips editors * NPE for description property (New/Edit Resource Wizard) * Remove code from description (Expression function) -- 2022-09-29 - Bis ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Default suffix for output signal was wrong (ReplaceSamples function) -- 2022-09-29 ADDED : * Improve replace Samples function initialization * Color management for category editor FIXED : * NPE with memento init. or restore view * Wrong function in clone method (ReplaceSamples function) * V. and H. scrolls are now available (Expression function) -- 2022-09-27 ADDED : * Threshold function (Matlab & Python) * Replace samples function (Matlab only) FIXED : * Improve exception message * Bug in Maximum function error (Matlab only) -- 2022-09-26 ADDED : * Expermiments view save state * Expression function (Matlab & Python) FIXED : * Derivative function : add zero at signal beginning not end -- 2022-07-26 ADDED : * Subjects view save state FIXED : Nothing -- 2022-07-25 ADDED : * Change sample frequency function FIXED : * Return proper tool tip for channel editor function (Python) -- 2022-07-11 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Resize data if trials have not always same number of samples (Python) -- 2022-07-08 ADDED : * Add support for ADW data files to Python Math. engine FIXED : * Resolve Bugs on params parsing and wrong dialog layout * Wrong Front cut intial value (0 not 1) -- 2022-07-05 - Bis ADDED : * Auto select newly added marker in Signal editor * Help update for Optitrack type 1 data files * Add support to import subjects from Optitrack type 1 data files FIXED : Nothing -- 2022-07-05 ADDED : * Support for functions editor * Support for functions view * Font size increase/decrease support in text editors * Stop math engine when App. is closed and action is not canceled * Add reportNonDisposed=false JVM argument to docometre.ini file FIXED : * Bug correction on mean computation (Matlab only) * Don't stop MathEngine if save subject is canceled * Bug reading Functions text files * NPE in Resource editor input * Enable setType menu item only if selected part is experimentView * Remove excess backslash in Find amplitude backward and forward * Bug when customer function was renamed * Bug on user (customer) functions files saving * Do not manage Handles for user functions -- 2022-06-18 ADDED : * Trust Pref. Page translation (continued) * It's now possible to cancel "unload" subject action FIXED : * Force default systems property values if not already performed * Error message refacoring in several Matlab functions * Save and Save all commands bad behaviour * Retrieve channel from its full name not only from provided experiment -- 2022-06-14 - Bis ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * a bug where it was impossible to save subject -- 2022-06-14 ADDED : * Update Help * New Trust Pref. Page translation FIXED : * Refactoring in Matlab and Python scripts * Bug if "ans" variable exists calling "getLoadedSubjects" (Matlab only) -- 2022-06-07 ADDED : * Shortcut 'D' for 'docometre.experiments' (Python) FIXED : * Bad URI exception when paste from clipboard -- 2022-06-03 ADDED : * Improve automatic color selection in charts * Move to Eclipse 03 2022 release FIXED : * IOOBException in XYZ charts (End Cut can be greater than points size) * Change painting order in signals charts * Java 11 requirement for Py4j and o.e.ui.cheatsheets * Some refactoring for deprecation * Can now run data processing when source tab is selected -- 2022-05-31 ADDED : * Support for marker selection in signal editor * Interpolate 1-D function * Duplication signal function * Print Math engine version at start up * Categories management to 2D and 3D Charts * Categories labels near trials numbers in Signal editors FIXED : * Wrong default suffix interpolate function * Check if it's Optitrack type 1 and not only data files when loading subject to call optitrack loading method -- 2022-05-20 ADDED : * Export Markers function (Matlab and Python) FIXED : * Float type was not handled when loading/saving subject (Python) * Properly update workbench when data is processed * Take multiple markers in account in Faf, Fab functions (Matlab,Python) * In batch data processing, save/unload subject is now taken in account * Transfert function : now all markers are transferred * Set Selection provider in Source Viewer (Copy from source viewer is now working !) -- 2022-05-12 ADDED : * Support for code source editor in epxressions function FIXED : Nothing -- 2022-05-11 - Bis ADDED : * Add support for external paste files FIXED : Nothing -- 2022-05-11 ADDED : * Matlab functions : find peaks (max and min) and absolute value * Python functions : find peaks min * Display message when trying to add marker whereas cursor is not active * Update source viewers automatically * Update show cursor property in opened editors * Shifting of the blocks during paste FIXED : * Add forgotten "import scipy" in FIND_PEAKS python function -- 2022-05-05 - Ter FIXED : * Bug on replacing back slash on windows (tested before !) -- 2022-05-05 - Bis FIXED : * Bug on replacing back slash on windows -- 2022-05-05 ADDED : * Find peaks function -- 2022-05-02 ADDED : * Support for Optitrack CSV data files with Markers only. Matlab and Python. FIXED : * Wrong button style (SWT) in 2D and 3D charts * Bug in SelectChannelsWizard in perform finish -- 2022-04-22 - Bis ADDED : nothing FIXED : * RS_RESET and RS_INIT was not done on RS232 interface for ADwin gold -- 2022-04-22 ADDED : nothing FIXED : * Return code for comment blocks must be empty string not null -- 2022-04-04 ADDED : Proper icon for unknown resource type FIXED : nothing -- 2022-03-31 ADDED : * Support for user function to Math Engines * Support for Docker (Adwin on Mac OS 10.15 and more) FIXED : * Need double backslash in reg. exp. parameters (user functions) -- 2022-03-25 ADDED : * Protocol importation feature (Issue #10) * Import resource enhancement * Error message enhancement * Help pages enhancement * Change about dialog text * Support for custom/user function FIXED : * Bug where subject with almost same name are unloaded (Python) * Bug on files validation when importing subjects or experiments -- 2022-02-23 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Time values are no longer in samples files (Arduino Uno) * Error in duration computation (Signal Editor) -- 2022-02-21 ADDED : * Update Acknowlegements FIXED : * Bad display on New/Edit Session Wizard -- 2022-02-10 ADDED : * Sample frequency dialog when data editor do not find one FIXED : * Bug in Stimulus initialization -- 2022-02-9 - Bis ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Initialize time to zero (ADwin and Uno) -- 2022-02-9 ADDED : * Adwin/Arduino/Python/Matlab files are now in Libraries plug-in * Header comments to user functions (ADwin and Arduino Uno) * Stimulus feature * Analog and Digital Wait functions * Transfert function FIXED : * Libraries path now comes from default pref. not from dacq. conf. * ADwin, Arduino Uno, Matlab and Python preferences changes * Bug when a resource is renamed and not opened : must deserialize it * When exporting experiment, sytem type was lost for Log files. This property is now written in properties file -- 2022-01-26 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Build message internationalization -- 2022-01-25 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Bad indentation for variables transfer code (Arduino) -- 2022-01-21 ADDED : * Internationalization for ADwin * Apply "show Cursor/Marker" immediately to all Signal Editors FIXED : * Add user library support for Arduino Uno on Linux and Windows Plat. * Message correction when compilation has succeeded * Proper management of the page's validity -- 2022-01-11 - Ter ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Wrong default location for Matlab and Python Scripts -- 2022-01-11 - Bis ADDED : * Update preferences (again!) FIXED : Nothing -- 2022-01-11 ADDED : * Update preferences (again) FIXED : Nothing -- 2022-01-10 ADDED : * Update preferences FIXED : Nothing -- 2022-01-07 - Bis ADDED : * Set workbench window maximized at first launch FIXED : Nothing -- 2022-01-07 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Bug at start up when ".medata" folder does not exist -- 2022-01-06 ADDED : * Add support for XML serialization using XStream library * Set default serialization to XML * Use workspace locker file to prevent several session to open same workspace * It is now possible to start a new Docometre Session on Mac OS X FIXED : Nothing -- 2021-12-20 ADDED : * Main menu refactoring FIXED : * Detach entry in contextual view/editor menu translation -- 2021-12-14 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Remove comment code for customer function when segment is empty -- 2021-12-13 - Ter ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Regression in workbench shared images -- 2021-12-13 - Bis ADDED : * Marquee tools in process editors with fr translations FIXED : Nothing -- 2021-12-13 ADDED : * Update description view when trials states change * Missing space in selected resource label * Improve Sleak view presentation FIXED : * Resource leaks with data editor -- 2021-12-09 ADDED : * Clean build capability. Called before any compilation, renamed or deleted process resource FIXED : * Resource leaks on images management * Update editors when process is renamed or deleted -- 2021-12-08 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : Build problem (files not deployed !) -- 2021-12-07 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Get script code generation even if it's not a script segment * Solve blocking compilation condition * Remove duplicate binaryMedian lib. function declaration in DocoLib (ADWin) -- 2021-12-06 - Bis ADDED : * Toggle real time charts view visibility between trials FIXED : * Suppress NLS unused Warning messages -- 2021-12-06 ADDED : * Improve Arduino Uno management (now use interrupt and improve data transfer, analog inputs and ADS1115 module management) * Elements in online help and cheat sheets * User libraries Arduino preference path FIXED : * Too long time response with editors (optimize method time response : getResourceForObject()) * Bug on gain selection for ADS1115 module -- 2021-11-19 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Fixed a Bug in Cursor and Marker paint control listener -- 2021-11-18 ADDED : * Support for 3D chart editor * Support for debugging tools * Improvement on QuickStart tutorial * QuickStartCheatSheet updates * IP addresses gatherer for adwin dacq. conf. FIXED : * SWT Resource leak : font not disposed (CursorMarkerDeltaPainter.java) * Many refactoring * Arduino Real time loop enhancement (micros() : 1us (Portenta), 4us (Uno) drift) * Remove arduino wdt to stop board : simply use exit(0) instead * Change default arduino global frequency to 100Hz -- 2021-10-14 ADDED : * Support for 3D chart editor - Step 1 * Allow Wine file path pref to be empty FIXED : * Bug when a channel is suppressed : transfer numbers were not updated -- 2021-10-11 - Bis ADDED : * Disable p2 garbage collector FIXED : Nothing -- 2021-10-11 ADDED : * ADS1115 module to Arduino Uno * Select all capability to SourceEditor * Improve FindDialog management and behaviour * Update Help * Remove Unit, unit and ampli. min and max in analog inputs (Arduino Uno and ADS1115 module) FIXED : * Bug on first sample line series drawing (Time and XY Charts) * Optimize Resource listeners when process compilation is started (UI responsiveness) -- 2021-09-22 ADDED : * All Python DSP functions have been ported to Matlab FIXED : Nothing -- 2021-09-15 ADDED : * Butt. high pass, front & end cut, Derivate, front & end cut from marker to Matlab engine * Managing some prefs. values at first App. launch FIXED : Nothing -- 2021-09-08 ADDED : * Sort customer functions enhancement FIXED : * Remove .gitignore from ADwin CUSTOMER_FUNCTIONS -- 2021-09-02 Added : * Sort customer functions Fixed : Nothing -- 2021-06-10 Added : * Add small margin width in XY Chart right composites Fixed : * Remove spinner parent set focus to prevent button selection -- 2021-06-09 Added : * Use same color form same category trials (Time and XY charts) Fixed : * Bugs on Import/Export experiment and subjects wizards -- 2021-06-07 Added : * Support to export only selected subjects from an experiment * Support to import only selected exported subjects (Step 1) Fixed : * Bug in displaying Markers : X and Y axis where swapped * Add Debug Messages to experiment exportation -- 2021-06-03 - Bis ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * use font style setter instead of direct field access (Maven build failed) -- 2021-06-03 ADDED : * Handle Standard and Error outputs redirection to file * Extend "Set type" Experiment View context menu to all types FIXED : Nothing -- 2021-06-02 ADDED : * Add custom functions for ISM chair command FIXED : * Fix IOOBE in RTSWTChartOscillo -- 2021-06-01 ADDED : * XY Chart Editor enhancement * XY Chart Editor persistence * Support for horizontal reference in OScillo. Chart * Use Eclipse Theme * Upgrade to Java 11 * Upgrade JSSC * Support for Tank and Gauge Charts FIXED : * Fix NPE bug (when platform was brutally closed and reopening while editors was opened) * Control decoration bad behavior in resources creation wizard (show/hide) -- 2021-05-20 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Bug With base front cuts in XY Chart editor -- 2021-05-19 - Bis ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Fix bug with front cut other than zero -- 2021-05-19 ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Fix OOBE when front/end cuts are taken in account -- 2021-05-18 ADDED : * Support for displaying Markers in XY Chart editor * Improve zoom and chart parameters handlers in XY Chart editor * Add support for Zoom listeners in interactive chart FIXED : Nothing -- 2021-05-17 ADDED : * Write Delay value for Arduino Uno in preferences * Add support for Range and front/end cuts managements in XY Chart * XY chart persistence FIXED : * Check if chart name already exists for chart renaming or creation * X, Y were switched in XY Chart ! -- 2021-05-05 ADDED : * Log error message when Serial Port Exception * Add a small delay (10us) after each Serial.println FIXED : * Retrieve right indexes from data files for Arduino Uno * Fix a bug when locale is different from exported locale * Use portable string when creating properties file for exportation * Use "/" instead of File.separator as it is platform dependent * Process one more sample (Motion direction) * Copy Front and End Cut in new created signal (Motion Distance) -- 2021-05-03 ADDED : * XY Chart Support (Step 1) FIXED : Nothing -- 2021-05-02 ADDED : * Some enhancement in session wizard pages * Allow "_" char in data and data batch processing file name FIXED : * Display current value now works properly for Oscillo charts * Manage operators for ADBasic, C, Python and Matlab -- 2021-04-30 ADDED : * Transfer Markers Group function (Python) * Motion Direction function (Python) FIXED : * Change default suffix in Motion Distance function (Python) -- 2021-04-29 - BIS FIXED : * bug where temporaryBuffer declared several times when floats are transfered (Arduino Uno) -- 2021-04-29 ADDED : * Find Amplitude backward and forward to python functions * Add Front and End cut from marker functions (Python) * Add Font and display current value support to Oscillo and XY charts FIXED : * Markers group number was wrong when deleting it (Signal editor) * Channel name was wrong when "use prefix" Session property is false * Some functions titles refactoring * Manage some errors when front cut is greater than end cut -- 2021-04-27 - BIS FIXED : * Channel name was wrong when "use prefix" Session property is empty * Use num.copy to avoid "pointer effect" with numpy array assignment -- 2021-04-27 ADDED : * Minimum and Maximum Python functions FIXED : * Process editor force update * TIMER_MARKER function : trialsList was hard coded to 0:417 ! -- 2021-04-23 ADDED : * Add Motion Distance function (Python) * Add Time Marker function (Python) * Add Derivative function (Python) FIXED : * Use default parameters in functions * Add CR to each end python functions (clearly separate each functions in script) * Update selection service in Subjects View -- 2021-04-16 ADDED : * vectorize endcut and frontcut * Set Charts dialog layout modeless * Functions menu internationalization * Add Front Cut and End Cut functions (python only for now) * Add Butterworth high pass filter to python engine FIXED : * ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: Index 0 out of bounds for length 0 (RTSWChartOscillo) * JRE and compiler compliance to 1.8 (Theme plugin) * Python functions enhancement (remove gateway System.out) * Update cache channels when channel is deleted * Some enhancement in python functions and code scanner * Managing load/Save/Unload subject with batch processing * Bad style in chart options Group preferences * Front and End cut where not taken in account in time vector creation * Manage bug when path to Docometre.py is wrong -- 2021-04-9 ADDED : Some Console Messages for python controller -- 2021-04-7 ADDED : * Improve description message in Function Configuration Dialog * Improve process random spreading (never two same consecutive trials) * Default python time out from 10 to 15 sec. FIXED : * Bug when starting Python Engine on Windows (use now portable strings) * Internationalization : some strings unused some others missing * Import Wizard : NPE if folder is empty * Import Wizard : Do not apply property if resource does not exist * Bug on time out evaluation in Python Controller -- 2021-03-24 ADDED : * It is now possible to export experiment with or without data files * Improve export wizard description message * Improve export progress monitor FIXED : * Code generation bug where If and Do blocks where not taken in account -- 2021-03-19 ADDED : * Export data wizard * Support for comment in processes (ADWin, Arduino Uno, Matlab, Python) * Support for Python syntax coloring editor FIXED : * Wrong markers group number in MathEngine * Channels Container Refactoring -- 2021-02-15 ADDED : * Support for features in MathEngine * Error management to MathEngine scripts * Mean function * Channels choices improvements in functions * Cache support for channel management Fixed : * Bug correction on multiple "#INCLUDE ADWPEXT.INC" * NbMarkers and NbFields correction to NbMarkersGroups and NbFeatures in data model -- 2021-01-25 -- BIS FIXED : * NPE on monitor cancellation ADDED : * Show message when channel used by any function cannot be found * Batch data processing editor (data model, GUI and Undo/Redo) * Ask to stop MathEngine before allowing workbench shutdown FIXED : * CAN Module page was always marked dirty when opened. * Bug correction when a paste resource has file extension ADDED : * Add Math Engine view * Save subject without Exp.Subj prefix - Load adding Exp.Subj prefix * Add support to handle transmit/receive mode and multiple message IDs in CAN module * Update Math engine when subject/experiment is loaded and renamed * Unload experiment in Math engine when it is deleted * Update Exp. and Subj. view once a launched data processing has finished * Manage indentation for Arduino/ADWin - Matlab/Python * Remove blocking error message when configuring function pref. * Add support for live Math engine type changes : don't need to restart anymore FIXED : * Bug correction on retrieving created or modified channels * FrontCut & EndCut correction for Matlab Engine * Bug correction on numpy data files path * Some NPE -- 2020-10-21 -- ADDED : * Print custom function label in generated process code * Support for Python Engine * Support for markers * Support for Modified/Save/Load/Unload subject * Allow subject to be loaded from raw or saved data * Move default math engine pref. from general pref. to math engine pref. * Support for show marker and cursor preferences * Unload subject before stopping math engine * When subject is unloaded, close all related editors * Ask to record changes before unloading modified subject * Support for previous and next trial in channel editors * Use Progress Monitor Dialog to load/unload subjects FIXED : -- 2020-09-09 -- BIS ADDED : * Support for comments in parameters files (ADWin) -- 2020-09-09 -- ADDED : * Support for SAMPLES Files with Matlab engine * Improve category container layout FIXED : * Bug where not all trials could have been taken in categories -- 2020-07-23 -- ADDED : * Improve Math Engines Preferences pages * Improve user information when open, delete, import, export etc. for long operation * Data processing prespective : >>>>> Subjects and channels View >>>>> Channels editor (Signals with cursor and Categories) >>>>> Data processing editor * Support for 3D Chart with JZY3D third library * "Associate with" menu item for process test * Allow Root workspace refresh (empty selection in view) * Support for channel deletion * Refresh Subjects view when a data processing had run * First data processing : Butterworth matlab lowpass filter * Change Eclipse RCP repository to 2020-06 * Math engine for Matlab * Support for ADW file import and loading in Matlab Engine * CeCILL-B Licences * Organize session FIXED : * Bug correction when export experiment file name is not the same as original one * Delete temporary properties file when importing experiment * Add ASS. PRO. FILE. for process test folder in properties files when exporting experiment * Bug on IResource Path on mac os * Init. cursor and marker coordinates to empty String to avoid NPE (Interactive Chart) * Set marker coordinates to nearest sample in series * NPE on Clean, Reset Trials and Toggle Trial Start Mode handlers -- 2020-03-11 -- ADDED : * Improve paste resources action * Add error marker in Arduino Diary FXED : Nothing -- 2020-03-05 -- QUATER ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Manage OS dependent Path when importing experiment -- 2020-03-05 -- TER ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * ADwin preManageParameters : now handle NPE or NFE on parse float * ADwin preManageParameters : correct parameters logging when running trial -- 2020-03-05 -- ADDED : * Log parameters values before runnning process test or trial FIXED : Nothing -- 2020-03-04 -- TER ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Bug on Subject without any session (zero trials) -- 2020-03-04 -- BIS ADDED : * Add Binary median filter function for ADWin FIXED : Nothing -- 2020-03-04 -- ADDED : * Change Comment block colors FIXED : Nothing -- 2020-03-02 -- ADDED : * default blue theme * Update Welcome/Intro * Install Arduino cheatsheet * Start Session organisation wizard * Default cheatsheets updates FIXED : Nothing -- 2020-02-11 -- ADDED : * Add progress information on subject/session description view FIXED : Nothing -- 2020-02-09 -- ADDED : * Add percent done for Subject/Session in experiment view * Initial Pi4j support and Python Controller creation * Update several Vendors ID in Manifest files projects FIXED : * Initialize each CAN module channels's to zero to avoid random first value (ADWin) -- 2020-02-05 -- ADDED : * Now handle customer function code generation FIXED : Nothing -- 2020-02-04 -- ADDED : * Refresh selected resources when they are cleaned up * Manage undone trials when we are in acquisition mode/perspective FIXED : * Bug fix on Arduino : port busy on OSX -- 2020-02-03 -- ADDED : * Comment block support in process * Improve import menu availability * Improve experiment description management * Support for exporting experiment FIXED : Nothing -- 2020-01-27 -- ADDED : * Customized functions are now handled * Start documentation for sutomized function * Upgrade to Eclipse 12 2019 platform * Matlab Engine and Controller plugins * Now possible to change resource type * Now possible to change system type on DAcq resource * Improve import resource wizard FIXED : * Chart is flipped vertically on Mac OS when saved as image * Bug on objects nb handles management * Bug in Byte Serial Input Function (ADWin) * Layout correction in JVLMAC141WriteRegisterValueFunction (ADWin) * Bug on platform shared Image in Docometre Activator * Bug while compiling when no associated DAcq resource is found * Default ADWin and Arduino Uno Prefs. are now populated at first launch -- 2019-12-09 -- QUINQUIES ADDED : * Add Actual Position to available registers in JVL_MAC141 functions FIXED : Nothing -- 2019-12-09 -- QUATER ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Bug in JVL_MAC141_CHANGE_MODE.FUN -- 2019-12-09 -- TER ADDED : Nothing FIXED : * Once command sent, wait to read three "11H" values in CeCILL FREE SOFTWARE LICENSE AGREEMENT
Version 2.1 dated 2013-06-21
Notice
This Agreement is a Free Software license agreement that is the result of discussions between its authors in order to ensure compliance with the two main principles guiding its drafting:
* firstly, compliance with the principles governing the distribution of Free Software: access to source code, broad rights granted to users, * secondly, the election of a governing law, French law, with which it is conformant, both as regards the law of torts and intellectual property law, and the protection that it offers to both authors and holders of the economic rights over software.
The authors of the CeCILL (for Ce[a] C[nrs] I[nria] L[ogiciel] L[ibre]) license are:
Commissariat à l'énergie atomique et aux énergies alternatives - CEA, a public scientific, technical and industrial research establishment, having its principal place of business at 25 rue Leblanc, immeuble Le Ponant D, 75015 Paris, France.
Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique - CNRS, a public scientific and technological establishment, having its principal place of business at 3 rue Michel-Ange, 75794 Paris cedex 16, France.
Institut National de Recherche en Informatique et en Automatique - Inria, a public scientific and technological establishment, having its principal place of business at Domaine de Voluceau, Rocquencourt, BP 105, 78153 Le Chesnay cedex, France.
Preamble
The purpose of this Free Software license agreement is to grant users the right to modify and redistribute the software governed by this license within the framework of an open source distribution model.
The exercising of this right is conditional upon certain obligations for users so as to preserve this status for all subsequent redistributions.
In consideration of access to the source code and the rights to copy, modify and redistribute granted by the license, users are provided only with a limited warranty and the software's author, the holder of the economic rights, and the successive licensors only have limited liability.
In this respect, the risks associated with loading, using, modifying and/or developing or reproducing the software by the user are brought to the user's attention, given its Free Software status, which may make it complicated to use, with the result that its use is reserved for developers and experienced professionals having in-depth computer knowledge. Users are therefore encouraged to load and test the suitability of the software as regards their requirements in conditions enabling the security of their systems and/or data to be ensured and, more generally, to use and operate it in the same conditions of security. This Agreement may be freely reproduced and published, provided it is not altered, and that no provisions are either added or removed herefrom.
This Agreement may apply to any or all software for which the holder of the economic rights decides to submit the use thereof to its provisions.
Frequently asked questions can be found on the official website of the CeCILL licenses family (http://www.cecill.info/index.en.html) for any necessary clarification.
Article 1 - DEFINITIONS
For the purpose of this Agreement, when the following expressions commence with a capital letter, they shall have the following meaning:
Agreement: means this license agreement, and its possible subsequent versions and annexes.
Software: means the software in its Object Code and/or Source Code form and, where applicable, its documentation, "as is" when the Licensee accepts the Agreement.
Initial Software: means the Software in its Source Code and possibly its Object Code form and, where applicable, its documentation, "as is" when it is first distributed under the terms and conditions of the Agreement.
Modified Software: means the Software modified by at least one Contribution.
Source Code: means all the Software's instructions and program lines to which access is required so as to modify the Software.
Object Code: means the binary files originating from the compilation of the Source Code.
Holder: means the holder(s) of the economic rights over the Initial Software.
Licensee: means the Software user(s) having accepted the Agreement.
Contributor: means a Licensee having made at least one Contribution.
Licensor: means the Holder, or any other individual or legal entity, who distributes the Software under the Agreement.
Contribution: means any or all modifications, corrections, translations, adaptations and/or new functions integrated into the Software by any or all Contributors, as well as any or all Internal Modules.
Module: means a set of sources files including their documentation that enables supplementary functions or services in addition to those offered by the Software.
External Module: means any or all Modules, not derived from the Software, so that this Module and the Software run in separate address spaces, with one calling the other when they are run.
Internal Module: means any or all Module, connected to the Software so that they both execute in the same address space.
GNU GPL: means the GNU General Public License version 2 or any subsequent version, as published by the Free Software Foundation Inc.
GNU Affero GPL: means the GNU Affero General Public License version 3 or any subsequent version, as published by the Free Software Foundation Inc.
EUPL: means the European Union Public License version 1.1 or any subsequent version, as published by the European Commission.
Parties: mean both the Licensee and the Licensor.
These expressions may be used both in singular and plural form.
Article 2 - PURPOSE
The purpose of the Agreement is the grant by the Licensor to the Licensee of a non-exclusive, transferable and worldwide license for the Software as set forth in Article 5 <#scope> hereinafter for the whole term of the protection granted by the rights over said Software.
Article 3 - ACCEPTANCE
3.1 The Licensee shall be deemed as having accepted the terms and conditions of this Agreement upon the occurrence of the first of the following events:
* (i) loading the Software by any or all means, notably, by downloading from a remote server, or by loading from a physical medium; * (ii) the first time the Licensee exercises any of the rights granted hereunder.
3.2 One copy of the Agreement, containing a notice relating to the characteristics of the Software, to the limited warranty, and to the fact that its use is restricted to experienced users has been provided to the Licensee prior to its acceptance as set forth in Article 3.1 <#accepting> hereinabove, and the Licensee hereby acknowledges that it has read and understood it.
Article 4 - EFFECTIVE DATE AND TERM
4.1 EFFECTIVE DATE
The Agreement shall become effective on the date when it is accepted by the Licensee as set forth in Article 3.1 <#accepting>.
4.2 TERM
The Agreement shall remain in force for the entire legal term of protection of the economic rights over the Software.
Article 5 - SCOPE OF RIGHTS GRANTED
The Licensor hereby grants to the Licensee, who accepts, the following rights over the Software for any or all use, and for the term of the Agreement, on the basis of the terms and conditions set forth hereinafter.
Besides, if the Licensor owns or comes to own one or more patents protecting all or part of the functions of the Software or of its components, the Licensor undertakes not to enforce the rights granted by these patents against successive Licensees using, exploiting or modifying the Software. If these patents are transferred, the Licensor undertakes to have the transferees subscribe to the obligations set forth in this paragraph.
5.1 RIGHT OF USE
The Licensee is authorized to use the Software, without any limitation as to its fields of application, with it being hereinafter specified that this comprises:
1. permanent or temporary reproduction of all or part of the Software by any or all means and in any or all form.
2. loading, displaying, running, or storing the Software on any or all medium.
3. entitlement to observe, study or test its operation so as to determine the ideas and principles behind any or all constituent elements of said Software. This shall apply when the Licensee carries out any or all loading, displaying, running, transmission or storage operation as regards the Software, that it is entitled to carry out hereunder.
5.2 ENTITLEMENT TO MAKE CONTRIBUTIONS
The right to make Contributions includes the right to translate, adapt, arrange, or make any or all modifications to the Software, and the right to reproduce the resulting software.
The Licensee is authorized to make any or all Contributions to the Software provided that it includes an explicit notice that it is the author of said Contribution and indicates the date of the creation thereof.
5.3 RIGHT OF DISTRIBUTION
In particular, the right of distribution includes the right to publish, transmit and communicate the Software to the general public on any or all medium, and by any or all means, and the right to market, either in consideration of a fee, or free of charge, one or more copies of the Software by any means.

5.3.1 DISTRIBUTION OF SOFTWARE WITHOUT MODIFICATION

5.3.2 DISTRIBUTION OF MODIFIED SOFTWARE

The Licensee is authorized to distribute the Modified Software, in source code or object code form, provided that said distribution complies with all the provisions of the Agreement and is accompanied by:
1. a copy of the Agreement,
2. a notice relating to the limitation of both the Licensor's warranty and liability as set forth in Articles 8 and 9,
and, in the event that only the object code of the Modified Software is redistributed,
3. a note stating the conditions of effective access to the full source code of the Modified Software for a period of at least three years from the distribution of the Modified Software, it being understood that the additional acquisition cost of the source code shall not exceed the cost of the data transfer.
5.3.3 DISTRIBUTION OF EXTERNAL MODULES

5.3.4 COMPATIBILITY WITH OTHER LICENSES

The Licensee can include the Modified or unmodified Software in a code that is subject to the provisions of one of the versions of the GNU GPL, GNU Affero GPL and/or EUPL and distribute that entire code under the terms of the same version of the GNU GPL, GNU Affero GPL and/or EUPL.
Article 6 - INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
6.1 OVER THE INITIAL SOFTWARE
The Holder owns the economic rights over the Initial Software. Any or all use of the Initial Software is subject to compliance with the terms and conditions under which the Holder has elected to distribute its work and no one shall be entitled to modify the terms and conditions for the distribution of said Initial Software.
The Holder undertakes that the Initial Software will remain ruled at least by this Agreement, for the duration set forth in Article 4.2 <#term>.
6.2 OVER THE CONTRIBUTIONS

6.3 OVER THE EXTERNAL MODULES

6.4 JOINT PROVISIONS
The Licensee expressly undertakes:
1. not to remove, or modify, in any manner, the intellectual property notices attached to the Software;
2. to reproduce said notices, in an identical manner, in the copies of the Software modified or not.
The Licensee undertakes not to directly or indirectly infringe the intellectual property rights on the Software of the Holder and/or Contributors, and to take, where applicable, vis-à-vis its staff, any and all measures required to ensure respect of said intellectual property rights of the Holder and/or Contributors.

7.1 Under no circumstances shall the Agreement oblige the Licensor to provide technical assistance or maintenance services for the Software.
However, the Licensor is entitled to offer this type of services. The terms and conditions of such technical assistance, and/or such maintenance, shall be set forth in a separate instrument. Only the Licensor offering said maintenance and/or technical assistance services shall incur liability therefor.
7.2 Similarly, any Licensor is entitled to offer to its licensees, under its sole responsibility, a warranty, that shall only be binding upon itself, for the redistribution of the Software and/or the Modified Software, under terms and conditions that it is free to decide. Said warranty, and the financial terms and conditions of its application, shall be subject of a separate instrument executed between the Licensor and the Licensee.
Article 8 - LIABILITY
8.1 Subject to the provisions of Article 8.2, the Licensee shall be entitled to claim compensation for any direct loss it may have suffered from the Software as a result of a fault on the part of the relevant Licensor, subject to providing evidence thereof.
8.2 The Licensor's liability is limited to the commitments made under this Agreement and shall not be incurred as a result of in particular: (i) loss due the Licensee's total or partial failure to fulfill its obligations, (ii) direct or consequential loss that is suffered by the Licensee due to the use or performance of the Software, and (iii) more generally, any consequential loss. In particular the Parties expressly agree that any or all pecuniary or business loss (i.e. loss of data, loss of profits, operating loss, loss of customers or orders, opportunity cost, any disturbance to business activities) or any or all legal proceedings instituted against the Licensee by a third party, shall constitute consequential loss and shall not provide entitlement to any or all compensation from the Licensor.

9.1 The Licensee acknowledges that the scientific and technical state-of-the-art when the Software was distributed did not enable all possible uses to be tested and verified, nor for the presence of possible defects to be detected. In this respect, the Licensee's attention has been drawn to the risks associated with loading, using, modifying and/or developing and reproducing the Software which are reserved for experienced users.

9.3 The Licensee acknowledges that the Software is supplied "as is" by the Licensor without any other express or tacit warranty, other than that provided for in Article 9.2 <#good-faith> and, in particular, without any warranty as to its commercial value, its secured, safe, innovative or relevant nature.

9.4 The Licensor does not either expressly or tacitly warrant that the Software does not infringe any third party intellectual property right relating to a patent, software or any other property right. Therefore, the Licensor disclaims any and all liability towards the Licensee arising out of any or all proceedings for infringement that may be instituted in respect of the use, modification and redistribution of the Software. Nevertheless, should such proceedings be instituted against the Licensee, the Licensor shall provide it with technical and legal expertise for its defense. Such technical and legal expertise shall be decided on a case-by-case basis between the relevant Licensor and the Licensee pursuant to a memorandum of understanding. The Licensor disclaims any and all liability as regards the Licensee's use of the name of the Software. Article 10 - TERMINATION
10.1 In the event of a breach by the Licensee of its obligations hereunder, the Licensor may automatically terminate this Agreement thirty (30) days after notice has been sent to the Licensee and has remained ineffective.
10.2 A Licensee whose Agreement is terminated shall no longer be authorized to use, modify or distribute the Software. Article 11 - MISCELLANEOUS
11.1 EXCUSABLE EVENTS
Neither Party shall be liable for any or all delay, or failure to perform the Agreement, that may be attributable to an event of force majeure, an act of God or an outside cause, such as defective functioning or interruptions of the electricity or telecommunications networks, network paralysis following a virus attack, intervention by government authorities, natural disasters, water damage, earthquakes, fire, explosions, strikes and labor unrest, war, etc.
11.2 Any failure by either Party, on one or more occasions, to invoke one or more of the provisions hereof, shall under no circumstances be interpreted as being a waiver by the interested Party of its right to invoke said provision(s) subsequently.
11.3 The Agreement cancels and replaces any or all previous agreements, whether written or oral, between the Parties and having the same purpose, and constitutes the entirety of the agreement between said Parties concerning said purpose. 11.4 In the event that one or more of the provisions hereof were to conflict with a current or future applicable act or legislative text, said act or legislative text shall prevail, and the Parties shall make the necessary amendments so as to comply with said act or legislative text. 13.2 Failing an amicable solution within two (2) months as from their occurrence, and unless emergency proceedings are necessary, the disagreements or disputes shall be referred to the Paris Courts having jurisdiction, by the more diligent Party.
